refnamediv.refpurpose: Calls dbinom function defined on R which takes m(size of the vector), a vector V, the total number of samples and the success probability as input parameters and the result is the binomial distribution value for each given x in the vector

listitem.para: V: vector of values for which binomial value is to be found
n : the total number of samples

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The function calls dbinom function defined on R which takes m(size of the vector), a vector V, the total number of samples and the success probability as input parameters and the result is the binomial distribution value for each given x in the vector

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: // dbinom on m, V, n, p y = dbinom(4,[1,2,3,4],5,0.4)

simplelist.member: Mohana N (Assistant Professor, SAS, Division of Mathematics, VIT Chennai)
